languages.text: Сотворилася распря. Голодные и хворые осаждали монастырь с молениями о помощи, и перекрыли коллектор водный, и заглушили генераториум во злобе. Люди же веры готовились к отпору.

A quarrel broke out. The hungry and the sick lay siege to the monastery, begging for help; in their spite, they blocked the water collector and unpowered the generatorium. The faithful, in the meantime, made ready to resist.
languages.original_text: Сотворилася распря. Голодные и хворые осаждали монастырь с молениями о помощи, и перекрыли коллектор водный, и заглушили генераториум во злобе. Люди же веры готовились к отпору.

traits.locale_text: A quarrel broke out. The hungry and the sick lay siege to the monastery, begging for help; in their spite, they blocked the water collector and unpowered the generatorium. The faithful, in the meantime, made ready for resistance.

A quarrel broke out. The hungry and the sick lay siege to the monastery, begging for help; in their spite, they blocked the water collector and unpowered the generatorium. The faithful, in the meantime, made ready to resist.

languages.text: Se produjo una trifulca. Los hambrientos y los enfermos asediaron el monasterio, suplicando ayuda. Presa del rencor, bloquearon el colector de agua y desconectaron el generatorium. Mientras tanto, los fieles se prepararon para resistir.
languages.original_text: A quarrel broke out. The hungry and the sick lay siege to the monastery, begging for help; in their spite, they blocked the water collector and unpowered the generatorium. The faithful, in the meantime, made ready to resist.

traits.locale_text: Se produjo una trifulca. Los hambrientos y los enfermos asediaron el monasterio, suplicando ayuda. Presa del rencor, bloquearon el colector de agua y desconectaron el generatorium. Mientras tanto, los fieles se prepararon para resistir.

languages.text: 双方之间爆发了争吵。这群身染疫病、饥饿不堪的人围住了修道院，乞求帮助。出于怨恨，他们堵住了取水器，关闭了等离子反应堆的电力。与此同时，修会的教士们也做好了反击的准备。
languages.original_text: A quarrel broke out. The hungry and the sick lay siege to the monastery, begging for help; in their spite, they blocked the water collector and unpowered the generatorium. The faithful, in the meantime, made ready to resist.

traits.locale_text: 双方之间爆发了争吵。这群身染疫病、饥饿不堪的人围住了修道院，乞求帮助。出于怨恨，他们堵住了取水器，关闭了等离子反应堆的电力。与此同时，修会的教士们也做好了反击的准备。

languages.text: 衝突が勃発した。顔色の悪い飢えた訪問者達は、修道院を取り囲んで助けてくれと必死に願った。そうしながらも、彼らは水収集機をせき止めて、発電機の電力を停めた。その間に信者達は抵抗の準備をした。
languages.original_text: A quarrel broke out. The hungry and the sick lay siege to the monastery, begging for help; in their spite, they blocked the water collector and unpowered the generatorium. The faithful, in the meantime, made ready to resist.

traits.locale_text: 衝突が勃発した。顔色の悪い飢えた訪問者達は、修道院を取り囲んで助けてくれと必死に願った。そうしながらも、彼らは水収集機をせき止めて、発電機の電力を停めた。その間に信者達は抵抗の準備をした。

languages.text: Es kam zum Streit. Die Hungrigen und Kranken belagerten um Hilfe flehend das Kloster. In ihrer Bosheit blockierten sie den Wasserkollektor und deaktivierten das Generatorium. Gleichzeitig rüsteten sich die Gläubigen, um Widerstand zu leisten.
languages.original_text: A quarrel broke out. The hungry and the sick lay siege to the monastery, begging for help; in their spite, they blocked the water collector and unpowered the generatorium. The faithful, in the meantime, made ready to resist.

traits.locale_text: Es kam zum Streit. Die Hungrigen und Kranken belagerten um Hilfe flehend das Kloster. In ihrer Bosheit blockierten sie den Wasserkollektor und deaktivierten das Generatorium. Gleichzeitig rüsteten sich die Gläubigen, um Widerstand zu leisten.

languages.text: Une querelle éclate. Les malades et les affamés assiègent le monastère, en implorant qu'on leur vienne en aide. Dans leur colère, ils bouchent le collecteur d'eau et mettent hors service le generatorium. De leur côté, les fidèles se préparent à résister à la foule haineuse.
languages.original_text: A quarrel broke out. The hungry and the sick lay siege to the monastery, begging for help; in their spite, they blocked the water collector and unpowered the generatorium. The faithful, in the meantime, made ready to resist.

traits.locale_text: Une querelle éclate. Les malades et les affamés assiègent le monastère, en implorant qu'on leur vienne en aide. Dans leur colère, ils bouchent le collecteur d'eau et mettent hors service le generatorium. De leur côté, les fidèles se préparent à résister à la foule haineuse.

languages.text: Bir kargaşa patlak verdi. Aç ve hasta güruh, manastırı kuşatarak yardım dilendi. Öfkeli bir şekilde su toplama ünitesini durdurdular ve jeneratöryumun gücünü kestiler. İnananlar ise bu sırada direnişe hazırlanıyordu.
languages.original_text: A quarrel broke out. The hungry and the sick lay siege to the monastery, begging for help; in their spite, they blocked the water collector and unpowered the generatorium. The faithful, in the meantime, made ready to resist.

traits.locale_text: Bir kargaşa patlak verdi. Aç ve hasta güruh, manastırı kuşatarak yardım dilendi. Öfkeli bir şekilde su toplama ünitesini durdurdular ve jeneratöryumun gücünü kestiler. İnananlar ise bu sırada direnişe hazırlanıyordu.
